name: Unsouled Digital Deluxe Bundle
description:
Take on the role of the Fallen Prince in Unsouled - a stylish, fast-paced 2D action-RPG. Fight your way through interactive environments and adrenaline-pumping encounters as you unravel the mysteries behind this world filled with the undead.

This Bundle Product contains :
  • Unsouled Game : Unsouled is a 2D action RPG game requiring immense elaborate control. Take a break from repetitive attack and dodge action by challenging yourself with the world of Unsouled.
  • Unsouled Soundtrack : From beautiful scenery to exciting boss-fights. Meet your game play experience again with 'Unsouled' original soundtrack.
  • Unsouled - Digital Artbook : Interested in knowing more about the World of Unsouled? Get one step closer to 'Unsouled' with Digital Artbook which contains original art of various environment, enemies, mighty Bosses and dev's behind story.
